name: Fontresizer
tagline: jQuery plugin for font resize on JavaScript "resize" event
body:
# fontResize

jQuery plugin for font resize on JavaScript "resize" event.

## Usage

```javascript

  $(window).fontResizer({
    elements: [{elem: ".fontText", size: 1}]
  , baseWidth: 1280
  , startResize: true
  , sizeUnit: "em"
  });

```
